section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The content of the sup element is typically rendered higher in relationship to the surrounding text and in a smaller font.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows a sup element used to ensure proper formatting of the exponent in the number ten to the power of five:
example.codeblock: The power produced by the electrohydraulic dam was 105 more than the older electric plant.
